rules_text:
When Candy Keeper enters, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
Decompose into Food {3}{B}{B} [i]({3}{B}{B}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that’s a copy of it, except it’s a colorless Food artifact with no mana cost and “{2}, {T}: Sacrifice this artifact: You gain 3 life,” and it loses all other card types. Decompose only as a sorcery.)[/i]
notes:
New card — Replaced Dumpster Diving

The raise dead effect for ucnommon got creature-fied, since it has great synergy with decompose
